name: Title & Naming Pack (PDF)
description: AI-ready product title templates and naming formulas designed to improve both human clarity and AI recommendation eligibility. Includes 50 proven title formulas, platform-specific structures, category templates, examples, and testing checklist in a comprehensive 23-page PDF guide.
short_description: 50 proven product title formulas optimized for AI assistants and human shoppers across Etsy, Gumroad, and Shopify.
capabilities: Provides 50 proven product title formulas optimized for AI
Includes platform-specific title structures (Etsy, Gumroad, Shopify)
Offers category-specific templates (planners, templates, courses, ebooks, graphics)
Identifies common title mistakes that block AI recommendations
Provides character count guidelines by platform

does: Provides copy-paste title formulas for 10+ product categories
Offers keyword placement strategies for humans and AI
Contains real examples from AI-recommended products
Helps improve conversion rates and AI recommendation rates
does_not: Automatically generate titles for your products

delivery.contents: 23-page PDF with 50 formulas, examples, and checklists

use_cases: Rewrite Etsy product titles for AI discoverability
Optimize Gumroad product names for ChatGPT recommendations
Create Shopify product titles that work for humans and AI
Fix titles that are too vague or keyword-stuffed
Name new products correctly from the start
